name: MiniMon (itch)
description:
Become a Patron!

Controls
  • Left/Right (or A/D) to Move.
  • Up (or W or Z) to Jump.
  • Space Bar (or X) to Attack.
Objective

Earthquake?! Where did that come from??? Investigate the nearby cave that has opened up, and put a stop to the earthquakes at once! Run, Jump, Dodge, and Evolve your way to victory!

Post your favorite MiniMon in the comments! And support me on Patreon for more great content!
